page.description: Write an event marker for the thread (used in tracing). This is an advanced function for use in diagnosing issues.
page.prototype: dim result as N = thread.RecordEvent(Name as C, Description as C = , StartWaitTime as N = -1)

argument.name: Description
argument.description: Default = "". A description of the event.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the elapsed time in microseconds.
